import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Card, Row, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const Catagories = ({ history }) => { const [keyword] = useState('') const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (keyword.trim()) { history.push(`/search/${keyword}`) } else { history.push('/') } } return (
All Pillow Felt Work Paintings Beaded Work
) } export default Catagories /* */
